room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Escape Canton in Canton
review: My family did the Outbreak escape room. And it was totally worth driving from Charleston WV to do it. I would reccomend it to anyone.

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Escape Canton in Canton
review: This was a great experience! We did the zombie outbreak room for our first room, and the four of us were able to get out with 2 minutes and 13 seconds to go! It was a great combination of problem solving and teamwork to escape from the room. We will definitely be coming back to do another room soon!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Escape Canton in Canton
review: My family and I did the Outbreak room. It was so fun and the zombie made it way more exciting!! We had a blast. I highly recommend this place!! We escaped with about 3 minutes to spare.
